tw.gui.crashMessage.description.string: We are so sorry, but it looks like TurboWarp has crashed. Please refresh your page to try again.
tw.gui.crashMessage.description.context: Message to inform the user that page has crashed.

tw.loader.assets.known.context: Appears when loading project assets and amount of assets is known

tw.loader.assets.unknown.context: Appears when loading project assets but amount of assets is unknown

tw.menuBar.reportError1.string: Some scripts could not be compiled.

tw.menuBar.reportError2.string: This is a bug. Please report it.

tw.menuBar.saveAs.context: Menu bar item to save project to an existing file on the user's computer

tw.menuBar.downloadToComputerLegacyAppen.context: Text that appears after 'Save project to your computer' on legacy button.

tw.menuBar.60off.context: Menu bar item for turning off 60 FPS mode

tw.menuBar.60on.context: Menu bar item for turning on 60 FPS mode

tw.menuBar.changeUsername.context: Menu bar item for changing the username

tw.menuBar.cloudOff.context: Menu bar item for disabling cloud variables

tw.menuBar.cloudOn.context: Menu bar item for enabling cloud variables

tw.menuBar.cloudUnavailable.context: Menu bar item for when cloud variables are not available

tw.menuBar.advanced.context: Text for advanced settings dropdown menu

tw.menuBar.advancedHelp.context: Menu bar item for advanced settings help

tw.menuBar.hqpOff.context: Menu bar item for turning off high quality pen

tw.menuBar.hqpOn.context: Menu bar item for turning on high quality pen

tw.menuBar.infiniteClonesOff.context: Menu bar item for turning off Infinite Clones

tw.menuBar.infiniteClonesOn.context: Menu bar item for turning on Infinite Clones

tw.menuBar.warpTimerOff.context: Menu bar item for turning off Warp Timer

tw.menuBar.warpTimerOn.context: Menu bar item for turning on Warp Timer

tw.menuBar.compilerOff.context: Menu bar item for disabling the compiler

tw.menuBar.compilerOn.context: Menu bar item for enabling the compiler

tw.menuBar.help.context: Text for TurboWarp Help dropdown menu

tw.menuBar.embed.context: Menu bar item for embedding link

tw.menuBar.parameters.context: Menu bar item for URL parameters link

tw.menuBar.translate.context: Menu bar item for translating TurboWarp link

tw.feedbackButton.context: Button to give feedback in the menu bar

tw.unsavedChanges.context: Title bar link indicating unsaved changes

tw.home.instructions.context: Header for instructions section of description

tw.home.credit.context: Header for notes and credits section of description

tw.featuredProjectsStudio.context: Link to turbowarp featured projects studio

tw.studioview.authorAttribution.context: Displayed in StudioView under project title to credit creator

tw.studioview.hoverText.context: Displayed in StudioView when hovering on a project

tw.studioview.error.string: There was an error loading the next page of projects.
tw.studioview.error.context: Displayed in StudioView when an error occurs

tw.usernamePrompt.string:
Can't connect to cloud variables because username is invalid. You can change it in Edit > Change Username.

It might be too long, contain invalid characters, or be used by someone else. (Current username: {username})
tw.usernamePrompt.context: Warning that appears when connecting to cloud variable server if the username is invalid

tw.fs.saveError.context: Error displayed when a file could not be saved

tw.alerts.warning.string: Turn on Warp Timer or disable compiler (in Advanced menu) while creating projects to avoid potential data loss. Also note that scripts may need to be restarted for changes to apply.
tw.alerts.warning.context: Message warning user of potential data loss.

tw.invalidParameters.fps.context: Alert displayed when fps URL parameter is invalid

tw.invalidParameters.clones.context: Alert displayed when clones URL parameter is invalid

tw.home.description.string: TurboWarp is a Scratch mod that compiles projects to JavaScript to make them run really fast. Try it out by inputting a project ID or URL above or choosing a featured project below.

tw.footer.disclaimer.string: Projects from the Scratch website are licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 license. TurboWarp is not affiliated with Scratch, the Scratch Team, or the Scratch Foundation.
tw.footer.disclaimer.context: Disclaimer that TurboWarp is not connected to Scratch and licensing information

tw.footer.host.string: Hosting for TurboWarp is provided by {fosshost}.
